text: revenue estimates the house ways and means committee shall consider what the unrestricted revenue estimates should be at intervals dictated by unforeseen economic and legislative changes and as determined by the chair of the committee the estimates shall be based on current law and economic conditions and shall include all unrestricted funds for a the combined general fund and the education trust fund b highway funds c fish and game funds the chairperson of the house ways and means committee shall notify the chairperson of the senate ways and means committee of any meetings convened in accordance with this section
